import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { update, remove } from '../../redux/foodSlice'; import a from './images/a.jpg'; import Empty from './images/empty.png'; const Basketorders = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState('') const foodItem = useSelector((state) => state.foods); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { const empty = document.getElementById('empty') if(foodItem.item.length > 0 ){ empty.style.display = 'none' } else{ empty.style.display = 'inherit' } }) const removeFood = (id) => { dispatch(remove(id)); } const handleQuantity = (currentId, qty) => { dispatch(update({id:currentId, qty})) } console.log(foodItem) return (

Your Orders

{foodItem && foodItem.item.map((element) => { return <>
{element.name}

{element.subcategory} ( {element.category} )

By: SmartResto {/* */}
₹{element.price}/-
})}
PRICE DETAILS (2 Items)
Total Item 5
Amount ₹125/-
Total Price ₹125/-
{/* */}
Select Quantity
handleQuantity(currentId ,1)}>
1
handleQuantity(currentId, 2)}>
2
handleQuantity(currentId, 3)}>
3
handleQuantity(currentId, 4)}>
4
handleQuantity(currentId, 5)}>
5
) } export default Basketorders
